text:
some feedback and ideas:
- form and input in the CMs don't follow the same HS default classes than HS forms (.field .hs-input etc.)
- <@U6GNQ7JBU> could you add a custom class in the body of the result page? like hs-search-page or something like that would be nice :slightly_smiling_face:
being able to edit the placeholder text of the default site search module would be awesome

We do have an update coming soon with some added features like placeholder text. It’s unlikely that we’ll add form specific classes to the typeahead in order to avoid inheriting styles that break the suggestions elements

I'm trying to add some elements to my search results and when i look at developer info everything comes up as results.xxxxx , but the js calls in the search results module show result.xxxx . Just wondering why that might be? Thanks!
